description.p: The T-shirt shows the Fellowship logo and the German text "Mach Dich Frei!" on the front and the URL of the Fellowship page (fsfe.org) with included FSFE logo on the back.
The T-shirt shows the Fellowship logo and the text "Hacking for Freedom" on the front and the URL of the Fellowship page (www.fsfe.org) on the back.
The T-shirt shows the ODF logo and the text "Liberate your documents" on the front and the text "Document Freedom Day" on the back.
The Fellowship keyring also contains a shopping cart chip.
People who spend their nights hacking for freedom usually drink a lot of coffee.
The Fellowship cap shows a stitched plussy and a the text "FSFE".

By making this sticker visible you show that you have donated 33 Euro to FSFE. Do good and show it! (Attention: The white font and the red heart are printed on a transparent foil. The producer of the stickers state they are weatherproof and should resist outdoor about minimum 5-7 years.)
